projects.title: Chat App UI
projects.details: A chat app landing page ui created with HTML and SCSS, I had fun building it because I was learning sass at that time and it reinstated my knowledge on css positioning and other properties.

projects.title: Gp Calc+
projects.details: A simple calculator to help students calculate their GPA seamlessly. This project helped me learn higher order functions and functional programming.

projects.title: Netfinder
projects.details: A simple website to display what Nigerian ISP Network a number belongs to. It was my first Javascript project :).

projects.title: Roshambo
projects.details: An intuitive rock paper scissors game, I learnt alot about OOP and DOM propagation and functional programming while building it.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.details: A progressive web app for tracking day to day tasks with an intuitive interface. Featuring a drag and drop resorting functionality, I learnt alot about  react hooks and context API on this project.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.details: I decided to build my portfolio with react after getting inspired by a design I saw on Dribble by Oguz (shot link below). PS: Check out the mobile nav animation :)

projects.title: Options Education
projects.details: I built  landing page for an educational agency that processes application to study abroad, I had fun learning firebase to handle the form.

projects.title: Visaintel
projects.details: Led the frontend development of a travel marketplace website, featuring chats, an escrow payments system, and a user and admin dashboard using technologies such as React, Redux, and Material UI, to build scalable and modular UI components.

projects.title: The Raji Project  :)
projects.details: I was learning the next.js framework and typescript, then I decided to practice and play around by building a portfolio website for a friend. I especially had fun combining design ideas from various websites online and animating the elements.

projects.title: Maven.fund
projects.details: Maven is an exclusive cryptocurrency fund designed to consistently outperform the market using proprietary trading strategies and algorithms. I built the dashboard and landing page all in vanilla for optimised SSR using sass to create a mini-css utility-based libary. It was a fun project especially working on the svg animations with anime.js
